resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81291</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81291</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4294</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Trade Unions/Controls in a Business/EU</string>
            <string language="es">Sindicatos/Controles en una empresa/UE</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceardchumainn/Smachthaí i nGnó/AE</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäftsunions/Controls in einem Business/EU</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Unions/Controls commercial dans un Business/EU</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unions/Controls de comércio em um Business/EU</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unions/Controls commerciale in un 
Business/UE</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συνδικάτα/έλεγχοι σε μια επιχείρηση/μια ΕΕ</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Sample tests for students featuring questions relating to the Enterprise and the People in  Business units of the syllabus. Suggested solutions are provided to help compare answers.</string>
            <string language="es">Tests de muestra para que los estudiantes hagan preguntas relativas a la Empresa y las personas en las unidades de empresariales del plan de estudios. Se ofrecen soluciones sugeridas para ayudar a comparar las respuestas.</string>
            <string language="ga">Scrúduithe samplacha do dhaltaí ina bhfuil ceisteanna a bhaineann le haonaid Fiontraíochta agus Daoine i nGnó den siollabas. Cuirtear freagraí molta agus cabhair le freagraí a chur i gcomparáid ar fáil.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business</string>
            <string language="es">Empresariales. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Gnó</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prüfen Sie Tests für die Kursteilnehmer, die 
Fragen in bezug auf das Unternehmen und die Leute in den 
Unternehmenseinheiten des Syllabus kennzeichnen. Vorgeschlagene 
Lösungen werden zur Hilfe vergleichen Antworten zur Verfügung 
gestellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Échantillonnez les essais pour des étudiants 
comportant des questions concernant l'entreprise et les personnes dans
des unités d'affaires du programme. Des solutions suggérées 
sont fournies à l'aide comparent des réponses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Prove testes para os estudantes que caracterizam 
as perguntas que relacionam-se à empresa e aos povos em unidades de 
negócio do syllabus. As soluções sugeridas são fornecidas à
ajuda comparam respostas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Provi le prove per gli allievi che caratterizzano
le domande per quanto riguarda l'impresa e la gente nelle unità di 
affari del programma. Le soluzioni suggerite sono fornite ad 
aiuto confrontano le risposte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δοκιμές δειγμάτων για τους σπουδαστές που 
χαρακτηρίζουν τις ερωτήσεις σχετικά με την επιχείρηση και τους 
ανθρώπους στις επιχειρησιακές μονάδες της διδακτέας ύλης. 
Οι προτεινόμενες λύσεις παρέχονται για να βοηθήσουν να 
συγκρίνουν τις απαντήσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commercio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχείρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4294</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

END:VCARD</entity>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

FN:Scoilnet
END:VCARD</entity>

        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
